channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘The Forever Winter’ Devs Declare War Against Greedy Gaming Trends
item.description: Fun Dog Studios has some choice words about the game industry in a new Early Access Trailer. "That nickel and diming sh*t is for the birds.”
